North Agrabad () is the No. 24 Ward of Chattogram City Corporation and a part of Double Mooring Thana, Bangladesh.
Population data
According to the 2011 Census of Bangladesh, the total population of North Agrabad ward is 1,08,513 people. Among them 56,606 are male and 51,907 are female. Total families are 22,912.
